channel.title: Anton Okolnychyi on Community Over Code Europe
channel.description: Recent content in Anton Okolnychyi on Community Over Code Europe

item.title: Apache Iceberg Planning Explained
item.description: A critical aspect of any table format is the rapid identification of files relevant for a query irrespective of the underlying data volume. The focus of this presentation is on the job planning process in Apache Iceberg, highlighting its efficiency and ability to scale to tens of millions of files. This session will explain how the project leverages a hybrid strategy for planning jobs, seamlessly transitioning between local and distributed execution for optimal performance.
